solution_line_template: Hillary sells {crafts_sold} crafts for {price_per_craft} dollars each, for a total of {crafts_sold} crafts * ${price_per_craft}/craft = $<<{crafts_sold}*{price_per_craft}={sales_total}>>{sales_total}

She receives an extra {extra_from_customer} dollars from a customer, increasing the total to ${sales_total} + ${extra_from_customer} = $<<{sales_total}+{extra_from_customer}={total_money}>>{total_money}
She then deposits {deposit_amount} dollars in the bank, leaving her with ${total_money} - ${deposit_amount} = ${money_left}
